parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server</value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Switches the unit behaviour when the waypoint becomes active.
<br>
<br>
Possible values are:
* "UNCHANGED"
* "CARELESS"
* "SAFE"
* "AWARE"
* "COMBAT"
* "STEALTH"

See the [[AIBehaviour]] page for details of the effect of this command on AI units. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointBehaviour''' mode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] As Above </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointBehaviour]] "AWARE";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Mission_Editor:_Waypoints#Behaviour|behaviour description]], [[AIBehaviour]], [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
